fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- This faction has no roles.
- All roles in this faction are created on the spot from templates posted in the roles thread. [X / Y / Z] means a random one of the choices separated by slashes in the brackets.
- No factional kill
- No factional chat

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all threats to the Mainframe.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Eliminate all threats to the Mainframe.
